items.name: init(name: String, elements: [NSFetchIndexElementDescription]?)
items.desc: Creates a fetch index description using the specified name and element descriptions.

items.name: var elements: [NSFetchIndexElementDescription]
items.desc: An array of fetch index element descriptions.

items.desc: The entity description for the fetch index description.

items.desc: The name of the fetch index description.

items.name: var partialIndexPredicate: NSPredicate?
items.desc: A predicate that selects rows for indexing, if the index is a partial index.
